pillar.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a tall upright round post used as a support for a roof or bridge
pillar.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Eight massive stone pillars supported the roof.
pillar.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a tall upright round post, usually made of stone, put up to remind people of an important person or event
pillar.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a very important part of a system of beliefs or ideas
pillar.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: One of the pillars of a civilized society must be that everyone has equal access to the legal system.
